name: Color iPhone
description: Color iPhone, iPad or iPod . Repair or c
overview:
We purchase iPhones, iPads, and iPods in all conditions! Our prices are highly competitive. Get CASH TODAY!

Please choose which device you’d like to sell (options on left) and fill out the form. Be sure to include detailed information about the item’s condition. If we are able to make an offer on your iDevice, one of our service professionals will contact you via email within 24 hours. If you decide to sell we will immediately send you cash via PayPal. Customers have the option of choosing payment as store credit which will be delivered via an electronic gift certificate, redeemable during checkout on our website. We are always able to offer more to those wanting store credit.

All you need to do is package and ship the iDevice to our mailing address.

We are located in the USA. Friendly, professional service guaranteed. If you have any questions about selling your iDevice, or about any of our other products or services, don’t hesitate to contact us.
